column2:
"...<%me>.
I don't know what you're planning... But I don't need to hear it."
"Let me help you. If I laid down my life for you, I think I could die without any regrets..."
"Without any regrets? That's a rare thing to hear from you, Quna."
"Casra... What are you doing here?"
"For one thing, I was hoping to appeal to your sense of morality."
"Ha! You, talking about morality? I can hardly stand the irony."
"Well then, let's set morals aside and stick to the facts."
"There are many people who stand shoulder to shoulder and fight alongside <%me>."
"However, when people are fighting and getting hurt out there, there's only one person who encourages and inspires them. People like that are few and far between."
"Unfortunately, I have no authority to tell that rare person not to take to the battlefield themself. However, if something were to happen..."
"...Hmph. You're the same manipulative slimeball you always were."
"Regardless, I'm glad that you understood my meaning."

"<%me>.
What do you think? What should I do?"
"It's your decision to make."
"...Yeah, I know. I knew before I even asked."

"...No need to answer, huh?
Yeah, I get it."
"Nobody knows the real me..."
"But I know all of them."

"...I knew what I was going to do from the beginning.
Isn't that right, Quna?"
"...So I'm not changing my mind because of what you said. Got it?"
"Whatever you say. As long as I get the results I want, I'm not particular about how we arrive there."

"I did consider attacking your perception of your own abilities, but...
No, this worked well enough."
"Why do you always have to get the last word?!"

"...<%me>.
When it's all over, I'm going to put on a live show to celebrate!"
"So you'd better come back! And when you do, you're bringing her with you!"
